title: Mexico : religion affiliation share 2018 , by type
summary: This statistic shows the results of a survey about the penetration rate of several individual leisure activities in france in 2015 , phrased with the question : `` except reading books , which of the following leisure activities do you do in your free time ? '' . It was found that listening to music was the most practiced leisure activity with a penetration rate of 88 percent of respondents , followed very closely by 82 percent of respondents who stated that they go out with friends in their free time with . Even though music is a very popular activity , it seems that French people would probably not choose to listen to music if they had more free time .

data.Response: Believer without formal affiliation to any religion
